Text:
Now then, Alexia. How goes the composition you
commissioned?

Oh, it's perfect, of course. I had one of our court
composers pen it, you see.

Well, if you will allow me to borrow the score for a
moment... I'll play it on the piano.

Heehee, you'd better brace yourself too, Pooch. I put
every little request I could think of into this song!
Wow, I can't wait.

(Yep, I'm seriously stoked...stoked for the moment
when this world's concept of music is blown to
smithereens!)

(This melody is...both pretty and complex. And the
rhythm is so unique, the tempo so fast...)

(I've never heard anything like this in my life...
and yet it puts me in such a joyful mood...)

(...Huh? Somehow this isn't what I had imagined...
But, it's still a good song, I suppose.)
...Whew. That seems to be the end.

Wow, Rose, that was great. And that song you had made
was pretty awesome too, Alexia.
O-Oh, yeah... Of course it was.

Yes, it truly was a wonderful composition! I'd never
seen a score like that before, but its bright and fun
atmosphere carried through all the same!

And the lyrics written here in the score are
delightful as well! The way they're meant to cheer
someone on and bring a smile to their face fits the
theme of our performance perfectly!

Um, lyrics? Oh, I didn't know the composer did that
much...
Wow, talk about amazing! I'm honestly moved.

(But, this, too, is because the producer in the
shadows was on the job.)

Alexia insisted on handling this herself, but when I
think of the music of this world...yep, it's
inevitably gonna be Classical.

That's why I gotta make our idol's theme! I'll whip
up something in that vein that references the hits,
and have Epsilon fill in the rest and write up the
sheet music...

Also, the lyrics need to be positive! No dropping
cryptic shadowbroker lines this time!

Also, gotta remember there's choreography to think
about, too. But those two are fit enough to handle
just about anything, so no need to hold back thereâ€”

Okay, that should do it! Just gotta get Epsilon to do
her thing, and it'll be perfect!

(Hell yeah, I'm knocking these idol issues out one
by one... That was a peak producer move, if I do say
so myself.)

Why do you seem so proud of yourself? I'm the one who
commissioned the composer, you know.

Okay, okay. Look, with the music safely settled, all
that's left is to practice singing and dancing.

Oh right, the dancing... Judging by the music, I can
imagine the choreography will be quite unlike
anything we've seen before...

Um, if I may...! Could you perhaps allow me to see to
the choreography?

You two have done everything so far. I need to be of
some use as well...!
Hey, no need to worry about that...

(I've already come up with a simple dance routine
anyway...)

Well, if she insists, then maybe we should let her?
She certainly seems enthusiastic about the idea.

Hmm... Okay, it doesn't have to be anything too
intense, but try dancing to the music. I'll play
something appropriate on the piano.
Thank you! Now, I'll simply take up my sword andâ€”
(Idols with swords... Honestly, it just might work.)

(Gotta start 'em on the basics first. I have big
dreams of takin' these two all the way to the top,
after all!)

(Still, it'd defeat the purpose to dull Rose's pep by
shooting everything down here... Just have to show
her the moves in a soft, natural wayâ€”)

Whew, boy, am I tired. Why, I can hardly stand up
straight. Woops...

And, wow, the sun sure is bright today! It really
brings a smile to my face!

...Um, what? What's gotten into you? Maybe you should
go see the nurse.

Wait, Alexia. Why not work Cid's movements just now
into our dance?

The steps and gestures are innovative, rhythmical,
graceful... They should fit the song perfectly!
Let's try dancing to the music once more!
Um...really?

Yes. Though it may have been by accident, Cid here
has given us a wonderful hint!
No, no, I didn't do anything.

(Whew, glad she picked up on it... As athletic as
they both are, all that's left now is practice!)

(...Or is it? Can't help feeling that I'm forgetting
something...)
